Close Colin Powell said on Sunday that he was not committed to supporting Barack Obama or any other candidate in 2012 I'm not committed to Barack Obama . I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell said on CNN's "State of the Union "I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates and finally see who the two candidates are who are going for this position."
